Author: Jason Lin
Class: CS559
Professor Sifakis
Assignment 6

This project features many different manipulations of shading and lighting. It uses the time uniform to discard lines and curves from the object that move across the object in the x, y, and z axes. It also uses time to vary the color of the lighting and the location of the light source and stretch the object horizontally, vertically and forward and backwards. It uses both diffuse and specular reflection, utilizing a Blinn Phong Reflection model. Many shading/lighting computations occur in the fragment shader as well.

The link to the project is pasted below. I personally think it looks coolest on the sphere or dragon object!

Hope you enjoy!

http://shdr.bkcore.com/#
